item.description:
It is the Holiday Season and what better way to celebrate than brunch at Scarlet Oak Tavern in Hingham.  We anticipate the restaurant will be all decked out for the holidays.  Members have asked for us to return here and we hope the 3rd time is a charm as we dined here for lunch on October 8th, 2007 and for an Appetizer Social on April 16th, 2008.

 

The price range for the Brunch is $8-$20.  We hope this will be festive and fun Brunch!

 

To check out the reviews and comments from our past ventures please click on the appropriate links as follows.

10/8/07 Event: www.meetup.com/ssdomg/events/6404336

4/16/08 Event: www.meetup.com/ssdomg/events/7514398

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Season's Greetings Brunch

Scarlet Oak Tavern
1217 Main Street, Hingham, Ma

781-749-8200

Website: http://www.scarletoaktavern.com

 

Organizer: Jeanne

Minimum/Maximum:  Minimum of 6 Yes RSVP's by 6pm on Friday, December 2nd.  Maximum of 15 people.

Guests: 2 per member.

Price Range: Scarlet Oak Tavern is expensive restaurant but well worth it. If would like to check out the Lunch/Brunch menu http://www.scarletoaktavern.com/menu-wine/l...

Event Fees: 2011 Annual Members - None, Group Members - $2.00, Guests - $2.00;

2012 Annual Membership Special! Join as an Annual Member for 2012 before the end of 2011 and save! Through the end of this year, 2012 Annual Memberships are $6.00 for Current and Past Annual Members and $8.00 for all other Group Members.  We will be having at least 6 Annual Members Only events in 2012 in addition to our 4-8 events in which Annual Members can bring a Guest to an event without having to pay an Event Fee. 

Cash Only Policy: Please bring cash! Paying for all of our meals in cash has been SSDOMG'S policy for over five years. It allows us to avoid the confusion of having the waitstaff run multiple credit card slips and generally helps to keep things simpler for everyone.

RSVP Deadline: Saturday, December 3rd @ 3:00 pm. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by the Event Organizer. Changes to "No" after the deadline will be considered No-Shows per our guidelines on the About Us Pages.

Inclement Weather:  This event takes place rain, snow or shine.  In the case of an extreme weather forecast we will update this information at least 24 hours prior to the event.

Please see the Pages for more information about the SSDOMG's policies and procedures which help ensure a smoother, relaxed, fun dining experience for everyone.

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 

Directions:

From Boston: Take Route 93 South to Route 3 South. Take Exit 15 towards Derby St./S. Hingham/S. Weymouth. Go right off of the exit towards Route 53 and follow the road for 1.7 miles. Take a left at the light onto Main Street/228, and the Scarlet Oak Tavern will be on your immediate left.

From the South: Take Route 3 North to Exit 14 for Rockland/Nantasket. Merge onto Route 228 towards Hingham/Nantasket. Follow this road for 0.5 miles to the intersection of Rt. 53 (it will be the first traffic light). Go through the intersection, and The Scarlet Oak Tavern will be immediately on your left.
item.how_to_find_us: Our reservation is under both 'Jeanne' and 'South Shore Meetup Group'.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Season's Greetings Brunch
